name: ChartTrendlineLabel
description: This object represents the attributes for a chart trendline lable object.

properties.name: top
properties.description: Represents the distance, in points, from the top edge of chart trendline label to the top of chart area. Null if chart trendline label is not visible.

properties.name: left
properties.description: Represents the distance, in points, from the left edge of chart trendline label to the left edge of chart area. Null if chart trendline label is not visible.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Returns the width, in points, of the chart trendline label. Read-only. Null if chart trendline label is not visible.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Returns the height, in points, of the chart trendline label. Read-only. Null if chart trendline label is not visible.

properties.name: formula
properties.description: String value that represents the formula of chart trendline label using A1-style notation.

properties.name: textOrientation
properties.description: Represents the text orientation of chart trendline label. The value should be an integer either from -90 to 90, or 180 for vertically-oriented text.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the vertical alignment of chart trendline label.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the horizontal alignment for chart trendline label.

properties.name: text
properties.description: String representing the text of the trendline label on a chart.

properties.name: autoText
properties.description: Boolean value representing if trendline label automatically generates appropriate text based on context.

properties.name: numberFormat
properties.description: String value that represents the format code for trendline label.

properties.name: linkNumberFormat
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the number format is linked to the cells (so that the number format changes in the labels when it changes in the cells).

properties.name: format
properties.description: Represents the format of chart trendline label.
